name: holiday balaclava
notes:
this holiday balaclava is not only charming but also designed for a comfortable, natural fit that won't feel tight on your head. 
wear it elegantly with the button band, and say goodbye to static electricity in your hair!"


**size**
1, 2

**finished measurements**
height 34, 38cm width 24, 28cm (flat/half)

**yarn**
sirdar haworth tweed dk : held two strands together.
50g/165m 
3, 4 skeins

option. 
[lamana]  premia : you can also add one strand of mohair
25g/300m
1, 1 skeins


**needles**
at least 80cm long circular needle in us 6/4.0mm and us 9/5.5mm

**gauge**
16sts x 28rows / 10x10cm / garter sts 
haworth tweed dk held two strands together / 5.5mm needles


**full video tutorial**
- part1 : https://youtu.be/xff3oszt1qc?si=gi1kk1tiwvkaqn5_¬ê
- part2 : https://youtu.be/ndokdfn4w-q?si=z76zswdfsrwzh_xi
